title: Eviction Notices
description: Note 2/27/2024: There was a previous issue with this dataset that created duplicate rows for each record. This issue has been fixed. Data includes eviction notices filed with the San Francisco Rent Board per San Francisco Administrative Code 37.9(c). A notice of eviction does not necessarily indicate that the tenant was eventually evicted, so the notices below may differ from actual evictions. Notices are published since January 1, 1997.

columns.name: Eviction ID
columns.description: The eviction notice ID is the internal case record primarily used for administrative purposes.

columns.name: Address
columns.description: The address where the eviction notice was issued. The addresses are represented at the block level.

columns.name: City
columns.description: The city where the eviction notice was issued. In this dataset, always San Francisco.

columns.name: State
columns.description: The state where the eviction notice was issued. In this dataset, always CA.

columns.name: Eviction Notice Source Zipcode
columns.description: The zip code where the eviction notice was issued.

columns.name: File Date
columns.description: The date on which the eviction notice was filed with the Rent Board of Arbitration.

columns.name: Non Payment
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated non-payment of rent as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Breach
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated breach of lease as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Nuisance
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated nuisance as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Illegal Use
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated an illegal use of the rental unit as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Failure to Sign Renewal
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated failure to sign lease renewal as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Access Denial
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated unlawful denial of access to unit as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Unapproved Subtenant
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated the tenant had an unapproved subtenant as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Owner Move In
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated an owner move in as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Demolition
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated demolition of property as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Capital Improvement
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated a capital improvement as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Substantial Rehab
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated substantial rehabilitation as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Ellis Act WithDrawal
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated an Ellis Act withdrawal (going out of business) as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Condo Conversion
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated a condo conversion as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Roommate Same Unit
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated if they were evicting a roommate in their unit as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Other Cause
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if some other cause not covered by the admin code was indicated by the landlord. These are not enforceable grounds, but are indicated here for record keeping.

columns.name: Late Payments
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated habitual late payment of rent as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Lead Remediation
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated lead remediation as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Development
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated a development agreement as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Good Samaritan Ends
columns.description: This field is checked (true) if the landlord indicated the period of good samaritan laws coming to an end as a grounds for eviction.

columns.name: Constraints Date
columns.description: In the case of certain just cause evictions like Ellis and Owner Move In, constraints are placed on the property and recorded by the the City Recorder. This date represents the date through which the relevant constraints apply. You can learn more on fact sheet 4 of the Rent Board available at: http://sfrb.org/fact-sheet-4-eviction-issues

columns.name: Supervisor District
columns.description:
District Number - San Francisco Board of Supervisors (1 to 11).

Please note these are automatically assigned based on the latitude and longitude. These will be blank if the automated geocoding was unsuccessful.

columns.name: Neighborhoods - Analysis Boundaries
columns.description:
Analysis neighborhoods corresponding to census boundaries. You can see these boundaries here: https://data.sfgov.org/d/p5b7-5n3h

Please note these are automatically assigned based on the latitude and longitude. These will be blank if the automated geocoding was unsuccessful.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The location of the record is at the mid block level and is represented by it's latitude and longitude. Some addresses are not well formed and do not get geocoded. These will be blank. Geocoders produce a confidence match rate. Since this field is automated, we set the match at 90% or greater. Please note, that even this rate could result in false positives however more unlikely than at lower confidence levels.

columns.name: Shape
columns.description: The location of the record as a Point type is at the mid block level and is represented by it's latitude and longitude. Some addresses are not well formed and do not get geocoded. These will be blank. Geocoders produce a confidence match rate. Since this field is automated, we set the match at 90% or greater. Please note, that even this rate could result in false positives however more unlikely than at lower confidence levels.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp the data was updated in the source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was loaded to the open data portal

columns.name: CBD, BID and GBD Boundaries as of 2017
Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods' (jwn9-ihcz) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

whom_it_may_interest: Tenants, Landlords, Housing Policy Analysts, Urban Planners, and Legal Professionals monitoring eviction patterns and housing stability in San Francisco.

queries.Monthly: SELECT date_trunc_ym(file_date) AS month, supervisor_district, neighborhood, non_payment, breach, nuisance, illegal_use, failure_to_sign_renewal, access_denial, unapproved_subtenant, owner_move_in, demolition, capital_improvement, substantial_rehab, ellis_act_withdrawal, condo_conversion, roommate_same_unit, other_cause, late_payments, lead_remediation, development, good_samaritan_ends, COUNT(*) AS item_count WHERE file_date >= start_date GROUP BY month, supervisor_district, neighborhood, non_payment, breach, nuisance, illegal_use, failure_to_sign_renewal, access_denial, unapproved_subtenant, owner_move_in, demolition, capital_improvement, substantial_rehab, ellis_act_withdrawal, condo_conversion, roommate_same_unit, other_cause, late_payments, lead_remediation, development, good_samaritan_ends ORDER BY month
queries.Yearly: SELECT date_trunc_y(file_date) AS year, supervisor_district, neighborhood, non_payment, breach, nuisance, illegal_use, failure_to_sign_renewal, access_denial, unapproved_subtenant, owner_move_in, demolition, capital_improvement, substantial_rehab, ellis_act_withdrawal, condo_conversion, roommate_same_unit, other_cause, late_payments, lead_remediation, development, good_samaritan_ends, COUNT(*) AS item_count WHERE file_date >= start_date GROUP BY year, supervisor_district, neighborhood, non_payment, breach, nuisance, illegal_use, failure_to_sign_renewal, access_denial, unapproved_subtenant, owner_move_in, demolition, capital_improvement, substantial_rehab, ellis_act_withdrawal, condo_conversion, roommate_same_unit, other_cause, late_payments, lead_remediation, development, good_samaritan_ends ORDER BY year
